data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Santa Catarina.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Santa Catarina, Cape Verde

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Santa Catarina will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 3,913 believers in Santa Catarina, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Santa Catarina, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Assomada
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Assomada, Santa Catarina, Cape Verde.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Santa Catarina, Cape Verde.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 3,913 believers in Santa Catarina.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.section_summary:
the state of Santa Catarina, Cape Verde has a population of 46,800.

We estimate Santa Catarina has 3,913 people who might know Jesus, 36,313 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,573 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 11 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Santa Catarina, Cape Verde.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
